H0.text: Which famous racehorse won Australia’s Melbourne Cup in 1930. Wotan

H1.text: Which famous racehorse won Australia’s Melbourne Cup in 1930. Nightmarch

H2.text: Which famous racehorse won Australia’s Melbourne Cup in 1930. Dalray

H3.text: Which famous racehorse won Australia’s Melbourne Cup in 1930. Phar

A4.text: Nightmarch won the Melbourne Cup in 1929.

A5.text: Nightmarch was the first horse to win both the Melbourne Cup and Cox Plate in the same year (1929), a feat repeated by Phar Lap the following year (1930), fellow New Zealand racehorse Rising Fast in 1954, Saintly in 1996 and Makybe Diva in 2005.
